/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. The road itself is lined with lampposts, standing like sentinels, guiding the way forward. In the distance, buildings rise against the skyline, their silhouettes faint but unmistakable. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, ready to drive down the road and explore what lies ahead.
